channel.title: Dance on Naresh Chaurasia
channel.description: Recent content in Dance on Naresh Chaurasia

item.title: Kizomba
item.description: Kozomba on Fire Kizomba Steps Kozomba on Fire Taraxa V/s Kizomba So taraxa is slow movements the wave movements that lady moving the hips. And when you are very slowly dancing with your lady or with your partner because the music is smooth there are not many strong beats. Wave - 1 Movement Taraxa I will be like these feet apart. Relax. One man one hand on the belly another on the back.

item.title: Dance
item.description: Dance Challenge Dance Challenge - May 2022 Dance Improvement - May 2022 Exercise / Stretching Dance Challenge Target to finish one challenge per week. By the end of 2 months you will have lot of skills up your sleeve. Dance Challenge - May 2022 Dance Improvement - May 2022 Body Wave Exercise / Stretching Strectching Daily stretching exercise for improving body movements and body language, making your dance steps sharp and clean.

item.title: Salsa
item.description: Salsa Salsa Shines Routine Salsa Dance Routine Seaon Stylist Bristol Section 1: Hour One Section 2: Hour Two Section 3 Steps YouTube Salsa Salsa Shines Routine Basic, Side Basic, Suzi Q, Side Back Cross, Heel Crusher, Right Turn, Left Turn, 4 Crosses, 4 Taps Salsa Dance Routine Basic CBL Basic, CBL, Inside Turn Basic Men’s right turn Basic Ladie’s outside right turn Hammer Lock 2 ways to come out of hammer lock Close Hold Open Break Seaon Stylist Bristol Section 1: Hour One Basic Side Basic Right Turn Left Turn Front Double Basic: (Shine) Both the basic are happening in front.
